Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='RTFMGR99')

BibliographicData.Title: Dual streams of auditory afferents target multiple domains in the primate prefrontal cortex

Reference.Comments: Retrogradely labeled cells were most commonly observed in layers 3,5 and 6, whereas anterograde fibers were most commonly found either as patches in layers 1, 5 and 6 or as columns spanning all layers.
